value.descriptionInEnglish: Solutions for Companies, Schools and Universities

section.descriptionInEnglish: Solutions for Companies, Schools and Universities

value.descriptionInPortuguese: Soluções para Empresas, Escolas e Universidades
value.title: Partnerships

value.titleInEnglish: BRASAS trains your company's professionals with excellent English. We have the best solution and the best English for your business!
value.titleInPortuguese: O BRASAS capacita os profissionais da sua empresa com um inglês de excelência. Temos a melhor solução e o melhor inglês para o seu negócio!

items.textInPortuguese: Aulas online, in company ou nas unidades BRASAS.
items.textInEnglish: Online classes, in company, or at BRASAS branches.
items.text: Online classes, in-company training, or at BRASAS branches.

items.textInPortuguese: Retorno de investimento: relatórios mensais de aproveitamento e frequência de cada aluno.
items.textInEnglish: Return on investment: monthly reports on the performance and attendance of each student.
items.text: Return on investment: Monthly reports on each student’s performance and attendance.

items.textInEnglish: Class formation according to the level of knowledge.
items.textInPortuguese: Formação de turmas de acordo com o grau de conhecimento.
items.text: Class formation based on knowledge level.

items.textInEnglish: Leveling done online, in company, or at BRASAS branches.
items.textInPortuguese: Nivelamento feito online, in company ou nas unidades BRASAS.
items.text: Placement testing conducted online, in-company, or at BRASAS branches.

items.textInEnglish: Leveling for candidate selection or employee promotion.
items.textInPortuguese: Nivelamento para seleção de candidatos ou promoção de colaboradores.
items.text: Placement testing for candidate selection or employee promotion.

items.textInPortuguese: Aulas em grupo ou individuais.
items.textInEnglish: Group or individual classes.
items.text: Group or individual classes available.

items.textInEnglish: Closed classes - composed exclusively of company employees.
items.textInPortuguese: Turmas fechadas - compostas somente por colaboradores da empresa.
items.text: Closed classes — exclusively for company employees.

items.textInEnglish: Billing of monthly fees directly to the company, with special conditions.
items.textInPortuguese: Faturamento das mensalidades diretamente para a empresa, com condições especiais.
items.text: Billing of monthly fees directly to the company, with special terms.

items.textInPortuguese: Descontos para funcionários e dependentes em turmas presenciais regulares.
items.textInEnglish: Discounts for employees and dependents in regular in-person classes.
items.text: Discounts for employees and their dependents on regular in-person classes.

value.title: BRASAS trains your company’s professionals with top-quality English. We offer the best solutions and the finest English training for your business!

value.titleInPortuguese: Já pensou em levar o inglês do BRASAS para dentro da sua escola?
value.titleInEnglish: Have you thought about bringing BRASAS English to your school?

items.textInPortuguese: Há mais de 55 anos formamos alunos fluentes em inglês com um método exclusivo de ensino. Uma parceria com uma marca reconhecida por sua excelência no ensino de inglês.
items.textInEnglish: For over 55 years, we have been training fluent English students with an exclusive teaching method. A partnership with a brand recognized for its excellence in English teaching.
items.title: BRASAS Quality
items.text: For over 55 years, we have been training fluent English speakers using an exclusive teaching method. Partner with a brand renowned for excellence in English education.

items.textInEnglish: The school has constant and direct contact with BRASAS, without bureaucracy.
items.textInPortuguese: A escola tem contato constante e direto com o BRASAS, sem burocracia.
items.title: Direct Communication
items.text: Your school will have constant, direct contact with BRASAS — no bureaucracy involved.

items.textInPortuguese: As aulas acontecem dentro da escola, sem necessidade de deslocamento, facilitando a logística e ampliando sua oferta de valor.
items.textInEnglish: Classes take place within the school, eliminating the need for commuting, simplifying logistics, and enhancing your value proposition.
items.title: Convenience and Safety
items.text: Classes take place on your school’s premises, eliminating the need for commuting, simplifying logistics, and adding value to your offerings.

items.textInPortuguese: Tabela diferenciada de mensalidades para seus alunos ou pagamento diretamente ao BRASAS, com condições especiais de faturamento para a escola parceira.
items.textInEnglish: Special tuition fee table for your students or direct payment to BRASAS, with special billing conditions for the partner school.
items.text: We offer a special tuition fee table for your students or direct billing to BRASAS, with exclusive payment terms for partner schools.
items.title: Special Tuition Options

items.textInEnglish: Class modalities with regular hours, 2 times a week, or extended hours, 4 or 5 times a week.
items.textInPortuguese: Modalidades de aulas com carga horária regular, 2x na semana, ou estendida, 4 ou 5x na semana.
items.title: Flexible Class Schedules
items.text: Choose from regular classes twice a week or extended classes 4 to 5 times a week.

items.textInPortuguese: Profissionais altamente qualificados, supervisionados constantemente por nossa coordenação pedagógica. Professores contratados pelo BRASAS, sem necessidade de contratação pela escola parceira.
items.textInEnglish: Highly qualified professionals, constantly supervised by our pedagogical coordination. Teachers hired by BRASAS, with no need for hiring by the partner school.
items.title: BRASAS Teachers
items.text: Our highly qualified teachers are continuously supervised by our pedagogical team and are employed by BRASAS — no hiring required by the partner school.

value.subtitleInPortuguese: Ofereça o melhor inglês e também comodidade e segurança para pais e alunos, com aulas em carga horária estendida ou regular, no contraturno. Além da aprendizagem do idioma, as aulas visam ampliar a bagagem cultural do aluno com atividades lúdicas que envolvem arte, música e eventos. Saiba mais sobre as modalidades disponíveis.
value.subtitleInEnglish: BRASAS, in addition to ensuring language learning, seeks to expand students' cultural background, with playful activities involving art, music and the promotion of themed events within the school. Bring an institution with over 55 years of success in teaching the English language into your school!
value.title: Have you considered bringing BRASAS English to your school?
value.subtitle: At BRASAS, not only do we teach the language, but we also expand students’ cultural backgrounds through fun activities involving art, music, and themed events right at your school. Partner with an institution boasting over 55 years of success in English language education and bring a world of opportunity to your students!

value.titleInEnglish: Bring BRASAS' exclusive English teaching method to your university's students and staff!
value.titleInPortuguese: Leve o método exclusivo de ensino de inglês do BRASAS para alunos e funcionários da sua universidade.

items.textInEnglish: For over 55 years, we have been training fluent English students with an exclusive teaching method. A partnership with a brand recognized for its excellence in English teaching.
items.textInPortuguese: Temos experiência há mais de 55 anos formando alunos fluentes em inglês.
Há mais de 55 anos formamos alunos fluentes em inglês com um método exclusivo de ensino. Uma parceria com uma marca reconhecida por sua excelência no ensino de inglês.
items.textInEnglish: For over 55 years, we have been training fluent English students with an exclusive teaching method. A partnership with a brand recognized for its excellence in English teaching.
items.title: BRASAS Quality
items.text: For over 55 years, we have been training fluent English speakers using an exclusive teaching method. Partner with a brand renowned for excellence in English education.

items.textInEnglish: The university has constant contact with BRASAS, without bureaucracy.
items.textInPortuguese: A universidade tem contato constante com o BRASAS, sem burocracia.
items.title: Direct Communication
items.text: The university will have constant, direct contact with BRASAS — no bureaucracy involved.

items.textInPortuguese: As aulas acontecem dentro da universidade, sem necessidade de deslocamento, facilitando a logística e ampliando sua oferta de valor.
items.textInEnglish: Classes take place within the university, eliminating the need for commuting, simplifying logistics, and enhancing your value proposition.
items.title: Convenience and Safety
items.text: Classes take place on your school’s premises, eliminating the need for commuting, simplifying logistics, and adding value to your offerings.

items.textInEnglish: Class formation according to the level of knowledge.
items.textInPortuguese: Formação de turmas de acordo com o grau de conhecimento.
items.text: Classes formed based on students’ knowledge levels.

items.textInPortuguese: Aulas em grupo ou individuais.
items.textInEnglish: Group or individual classes.
items.text: Group or individual classes available.

sections.titleInEnglish: Bring BRASAS' exclusive English teaching method to your university's students and staff!
sections.titleInPortuguese: Leve o método exclusivo de ensino de inglês do BRASAS para alunos e funcionários da sua universidade!
sections.title: Bring BRASAS' exclusive English teaching method to your university's students and staff!

items.textInPortuguese: Tabela especial de mensalidades para alunos e funcionários.
items.textInEnglish: Special tuition fee table for students and employees.
items.text: Special tuition fee table for students and employees.

items.textInEnglish: Revenue sharing percentage for the partner university, based on the income from enrolled students.
items.textInPortuguese: Percentual de repasse para a universidade parceira, baseado na receita dos alunos matriculados.
items.text: Revenue sharing percentage for the partner university, based on the income from enrolled students.

value.titleInEnglish: Partners and companies that already know our solutions
value.titleInPortuguese: Parceiros e empresas que já conhecem nossas soluções
value.title: Partners and companies that already know our solutions

value.subject: Formulário BRASAS - Quero saber mais
value.title: I want to know more
value.levelingTitle: To start, discover your level with our placement test.
value.levelingSubtitle: Our placement test helps you find out which module you should enroll in. Access the link below and start your test now!
value.formSubtitle: Leave your details below and we will contact you for more information.
value.acceptanceTermText: I agree to receive communications and personalized offers according to my interests

value.subject: Formulário BRASAS - Quero saber mais
value.title: Quero saber mais
value.levelingTitle: Para começar, descubra seu nível em nosso teste de nivelamento.
value.levelingSubtitle: O nosso teste de nivelamento te ajuda a descobrir em que módulo você deve ingressar. Acesse o link abaixo e comece o seu teste agora mesmo!
value.formSubtitle: Deixe os seus dados abaixo e entraremos em contato para mais informações.
value.acceptanceTermText: Eu concordo em receber comunicações e ofertas personalizadas de acordo com meus interesses
